entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering` seems to lack an implementation #60993
  • [API Proposal]: Stable Sort for Spans #60982
  • Flaky test: Breadcrumb_thread_does_not_finish_when_app_has_unhandled_exception can fail due to output interleaving #60980
  • framework 5.0 is not installed (?? but is) #60978
  • [mono] Loader always loads from application base directory #60976
    7.0.0
  • ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationSources disposes all config providers in .NET 6 #60975
    7.0.0
  • LdapConnection fails to bind (connect to server) .NET 6 on Linux #60972
  • Devirtualization in CrossGen2 for internal virtual overrides mismatches runtime behaviour #60969
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile using keyword parameters with @ prefixes #60968
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback11 typo #60965
    7.0.0
  • Double initialization assert in JSON's property cache #60962
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\explicit\\misc\\_relexplicit1\\_relexplicit1.cmd #60952
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest197\\Generated197\\Generated197.cmd #60951
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic(type: typeof(System.ConsoleKeyInfo)) #60950
  • SslStream: Don't include "NT AUTHORITY" in Distinguished Names list of CertificateRequest. #60949
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Stable sort #15803
    Future
  • `JsonSerializer.Serialize()` ignores `MaxDepth` option #60977
  • Lists should have AddNew that only adds elements to a list if they are not already contained in the list #60991
  • Some MethodInfo(s) of array types loaded by MetadataLoadContext are incorrectly evaluated as equal. #57728
    7.0.0
  • Make OptionsManager faster by falling back to IOptionsMonitor instead of IOptionsFactory #60473
  • [API Proposal]: IWritableOptionsMonitor #60858
  • MemoryCache erroneously reports successful additions after it's been disposed #1424
    7.0.0
  • Failure in RunThreadLocalTest5_Dispose #57102
    7.0.0
  • Failure in baseservices\threading\mutex\misc\waitone2 #6372
    Future
  • Contract between GetHashCode and Equals methods broken in HashSetEqualityComparer #18931
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'op1 != nullptr' #60957
    7.0.0
  • Please add IKeyedCollection<,> as a co(ntra)variance base interface of IDictionary<,> #28744
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow take underlying array from a List<T> #58153
    Future
  • After encrypting and decrypting some part of the string is missed in .NET Core 6. #60961
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource is too slow initialized #60963
  • Overload ImmutableArray.CreateRange to accept IImmutableList<T> #27644
    Future
  • API Proposal: Adding Array.IndexOf and LastIndexOf overloads that accept a comparer. #19057
    Future
  • SslStream.TargetHostName is unavailable #57105
    Future
  • ConvertToGeneratedDllImportFixerTests.PreferredAttributeOrder failed in CI #60934

PullRequests

Created

  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
  • Fix various dump generation issues for VS4Mac #60995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add a fallback RuntimeProductVersion in runtime_version.h #60994
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Deduplicate class names in the type generator tests #60990
  • [mono][workload] Work around a msbuild bug in MatchOnMetadata #60989
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_USE_ICALL_NEWOBJ #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Mark containing type for generated stub functions as unsafe #60979
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • error C2665: 'CorSigUncompressData': none of the 3 overloads could convert all the argument types #60967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #60966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Share RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar logic in SymbolicRegexMatcher #60956
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Log more info when perf counter category is missing #60955
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter

Merged

  • Build the native prereqs in the build-jit-job.yml #60981
  • Fix Equals overload logic for some methods of an array created using MLC #60894
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Account for versioned VS in up-to-date check #60970
    community-contribution
  • Add historical note on optimizing aspects of Value Numbering #60985
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix more alloc-dealloc mismatches #60691
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Script to collect asp.net benchmark method contexts for SPMI #60953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make noise if trying to use the cache after it's been disposed. #57557
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 7.0.0
  • Fix a thread local test #60892
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Mitigate NU1103 Error showing up during Maui Builds #60946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Explicitly emit a diagnostic for ref returns in GeneratedDllImport stubs. #60720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix MD array helper intrinsics for complex `this` pointers #60958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60702
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update JsonNode doc #60925
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix `build-native.cmd` for direct use #60926
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Extract various changes from the invoke and custom marshaler PRs #60877
    arch-wasm
  • Make memory mapped stress log work for child processes. #60828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix some typos in corhdr.h #60895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][workloads] Workload 7.0.100 #60893
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't flag methods that already have GeneratedDllImport #60929
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: refactor jump threading to prepare for allowing side effects #60884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make PreferredAttributeOrder test ConditionalTheory #60940
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test bug, 7.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Setting nullable string properties from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Improve VN for (EQ/NE (RELOP ...), 0/1) #60943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Alter amount of tests that run per PR for mono mobile configurations #60727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] preparation for module encapsulation #60928
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use lower call count threshold for tiering in debug builds #60945
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • release/6.0.1: Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60887
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Support for macOS 11 and Windows 11 for Arm64 and x64 #22380
  • <ServerGarbageCollection>false</ServerGarbageCollection> is not honored in Directory.build.props #22372
  • Creating Winforms application with errors and targeting is still 6.0 by CLI after installing the latest .Net 7.0 SDK build #22370
  • [Feature Request] Nuget package links in `dotnet list package --outdated` #22366

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable a couple of old tests that were left disabled. #22381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime. #22373

Updated

  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSourceGenerator throwing exceptions after edit removing attribute #57455
  • Add global using as quick action. #57452
  • C# code cleanup: Add a mechanism to remove inactive code (#if-defed out) #57451
  • Change assignments (change left hand assignments to the right and viceversa) #57450
  • New nullability warnings regarding lambda conversions are added in perfectly valid code upon updating to the latest compiler #57440
  • Opposite suggestion than obvious in VS 2022 #57439
  • AssemblyName can not use condition in multiple target frameworks project #57436
  • [LSP] Use stack instead of recursion in semantic tokens differ #57433

Closed

  • Failure in LspMiscellaneousFilesWorkspaceTests.TestLooseFile_MovedToRegisteredWorkspace #57422
  • CS8602 false positive after Debug.Assert() on .NET Standard 2.0 #57438
  • Unskip InitOnlyMemberTests.LateBound tests #56665
  • Integration tests fail to wait for async light bulb #57326
    17.1
  • Light bulb menu showed up over Pick Members dialog #57321
    17.1
  • "Format Document" doesn't work inside collection initializers. #57441
  • System.NullReferenceException: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.GreenNode.GetFirstTerminal(...) returned null. #57381

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SymReader packages to the latest #57458
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Forbid interpolated string handler conversions that reference an instance as indexer arguments in nested member initializers #57456
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove legacy property from tagging #57454
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor find refs to ensure there is always a gruoping for any symbol we're searching for. #57449
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE
  • Update ServiceHub version #57443
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • List-patterns: Add declarations of public APIs #57434
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57431
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • [LSP] Ensure LSP misc workspace test waits for workspace operations #57444
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • [LSP] Switch to project version caching instead of sln crawler events pull diagnostics #57380
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57446
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57442
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Compute val escape for list patterns #57336
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Adjust expected behavior for tests targeting late-bound access to init-only properties. #57426
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch to calling into IAsyncLightBulbSession directly to avoid polling. #57316
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57419
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57432
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make AbstractSymbolDescriptionBuilder.InlineAllDelegateAnonymousTypes() abstract #57435
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2

Updated

  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Merge `main` branch into `list-patterns` branch #57425
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix param-nullchecking build/test failures #57375
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix IDE remote analyzer loader on .Net Core #57407
    Area-Analyzers, Approved to merge
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #57421
    Area-IDE
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Do not normalize leading whitespace in code comments #57414
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix C# language name in spec #57427
    Area-Compilers
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.StartupTimeoutIsApplied failure #37915
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #37912
  • Startup regression: mapaction #37911
  • An option to publish Blazor WASM as UMD library #37910
  • Crank SignalR Testing topology in Azure #37909
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Base grid component #37908
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clean syntax for Razor-emitting methods (avoiding __builder, _builder2, …) #37907
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Unable to set route description or summary with minimal api #37906
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Redirect_uri not configured with NativeApp client #37905
  • FileNotFoundException: Could not find file 'D:\home\site\wwwroot\obj'. #37903
  • Setting `GenerateAssemblyInfo` to `false` prevents using ASP.NET Core 5 user secrets #37901
  • blazor server side custom attribute not work #37895

Closed

  • Log request headers at Trace level with opt-in #17908
    Backlog
  • Support client certificate RE-negotiation in Kestrel server implementation #21956
    Backlog
  • Add response buffering option for buffer size limits #5975
    Backlog
  • Adding a querystring to a pathstring can end up with a pathstring. #2728
    Backlog
  • Improve ccompression of RequestImageFileAsync #36407
    Backlog
  • Test failure: Http3 GET_GracefulServerShutdown_RequestCompleteSuccessfullyInsideHostTimeout #37913
  • Blazor posibility to wait for OnInitAsync before initial rendering #21285
    Backlog
  • HealthCheck Logging incorrectly passes ElapsedMillisecond and HealthStatus parameters #32523
    6.0-preview7
  • Startup regression: json, mvc #37867
  • Blazor Wasm Standalone Hot Reload .NET 6 RC2 Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 Kestrel #37749
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (125): Operation canceled #22186
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add a PageTitle property to PageModel base class that also updates ViewData["Title"] #12113
    Backlog
  • Utilize SPA framework provided proxy server for live reloading #23328
    Backlog
  • Create an analyzer that warns about using `app` instead a nested pipeline or endpoint delegate #20298
    Backlog
  • Rename EndpointMiddleware to EndpointExecutionMiddleware #37284
    Backlog
  • [Blazor Server] Exception on App Load #26966
    Backlog
  • Quarantine in `WebAssemblyAuthenticationTests` #34995
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Provide a way to auto generate the page title based on the page route in Blazor #25150
    Backlog
  • Support for Custom Elements in Blazor #19743
    Backlog
  • Blazor Webassembly Render into div (for sharepoint or react) #21747
    Backlog
  • Allow boot config location configurable. #22220
    Backlog
  • Blazor Prerendering Transfer State #22819
    Backlog
  • Support the mechanism like ReactDOM.hydrate() for Blazor SSR #26802
    Backlog
  • Startup services.AddJsonOptions(...) has no effect on Razor components #26000
    Backlog
  • ManifestEmbeddedFileProvider corrupt manifest file #29306
    Backlog
  • Blazor PWA: Add support for excluding subfolders and files from assets manifest #22472
    Backlog
  • Provide hooks to allow for integration with other JavaScript frameworks #5182
  • [Templating] Investigate error messages in the chrome/firefox dev console for SPAs #7812
    Backlog
  • [Templating] Styling differences between SPA template and default UI layout. #7826
    Backlog
  • [Templating] Difference between react and angular navmenus. #7827
    Backlog
  • Unable to configure server timeout of Node HTTP server using ASP.NET Core NodeServices #8447
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent line endings in packages.json in React template #9501
    Backlog
  • Angular + ASP.NET Core API - my own CSS is overwriten by Bootstrap default styles #10224
    Backlog
  • Garbled console output when running a new Angular app #11667
    Backlog
  • asp.net core + nodejs docker image for spa project #12959
    Backlog
  • .NET Core 3.0 Angular app behind a corporate proxy may require additional environmental settings #14392
  • UseSpa can't serve anonymous requests if there's a fallback policy in place #18787
    Backlog
  • 2000ms delay serving any SPA files in development environment #17607
    Backlog
  • create-react-app 3.3 breaks HMR and linting #17618
    Backlog
  • Performance issue in UseProxyToSpaDevelopmentServer #18062
    Backlog
  • Core 3.1, UseReactDevelopmentServer middleware & Performance #19052
  • ESLint Configuration Issue #20833
    Backlog
  • Spa Service Showing 503 Service Unavailable page with AspNetCore 3.0 and 3.1 #21537
    Backlog
  • UseSpa should not thow error when no index.html found #22020
    Backlog
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 React template live reload is extremely slow #22769
    Backlog
  • Please improve the ASP.NET React template with support for container-based applications. #23605
  • SpaProxy does not work alongside UsePathBase #24338
    Backlog
  • Blazor Wasm 2 way binding for <img> element does not work #28803
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Proxying requests to subpath with UseProxyToSpaDevelopmentServer #24438
    Backlog
  • Corrupt log messages after adding SPA to .Net Core 3.1 app #25726
  • Prerendering timed out after 30000ms because the boot function in 'ClientApp/dist-server/main.js' #27052
    Backlog
  • Self-Contained ASP.NET + Blazor WASM fails on Publish #37886
  • No boilerplate option for the Blazor templates #18137
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Webpack Live Reloading broke when I moved from .NET 3.1 to .NET 5.0.1 - Project debugging with VS 2019 16.8, using Angular 10 #29478
    Backlog
  • SpaServices: Make `--` in the package manager call optional for future compatibility with Yarn. #30654
  • Add Vue.js integration to aspnet core #30970
  • Template Angular Core error in version 16.10 Visual Studio #33436
    Backlog
  • Running .NET 6 RC1 web application built with the current Angular SPA template generates an [HPM] error after second proxied request #36707
  • [blazor / Webassembly] [Mixed platform integration] #37900
  • `LongPollingTransportOnReceiveGetsCalled()` is flaky #34563
    7.0-preview1
  • Missing `timeoutInMinutes` param in components-e2e-tests #37893
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Test failure in CanSendAndReceiveBytes #33454
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Flaky test CanFocusDuringOnAfterRenderAsyncWithFocusInEvent #32907
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Flaky test: CanSetCultureAndParseCultureInvariantNumbersAndDatesWithInputFields #33297
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Some blazor event tests failures seem to be related and will fail together #31195
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Failing CanBindTextbox_Decimal_InvalidInput test #34183
    6.0-docs-infra
  • CanUpdateValuesMatchedByType test failure #33715
    6.0-docs-infra
  • WasmAuthentication_Loads test failure #34886
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Flaky test: CanUpdateFixedValuesMatchedByInterface #34867
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Quarantined test: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.MultipleHostedAppTest #34395
    6.0-docs-infra
  • CascadingValueTest.CanUpdateValuesMatchedByName #33530
    6.0-docs-infra
  • ServerErrorBoundaryTest.CanHandleMultipleAsyncErrorsFromDescendants #33528
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Circuit not disconnect on all app exit scenarios #23015
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Create AzDO PR templates for internal/* branches #37917
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix typo in Web API template option description (#37780) #37914
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Stop running Components E2E Tests in Quarantined Test Pipelines #37891
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor

Merged

  • Quarantine failing tests #37916
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Un-quarantine Remaining Components E2E Tests #37897
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove quarantine attributes from Blazor e2e tests #37890
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Unskip signalr test #37894
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Add `timeoutInMinutes` for `components-e2e-tests` Pipeline #37892
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • feat (Codespaces) - Added Commonly used tasks to `tasks.json` for VSCode users. #37873
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean up WinForms BlazorWebView IsAncestorSiteInDesignMode usage #3173
  • CSC : warning CS8785: Generator 'CodeBehindGenerator' failed to generate source. It will not contribute to the output and compilation errors may occ #3171
  • [Net6][iOS] error MSB4044: The "ComputeBundleResourceOutputPaths" task was not given a value for the required parameter "BundleIdentifier". #3170
  • Which version of Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK for Maui Single project? #3169
  • VS Pro 2022 Preview 5 & MAUI project not loading properly #3168
  • "Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Text.dll'" debugging MAUI app on Windows Machine #3167
  • Add support for unpackaged apps #3166
  • [Bug] Essentials Connectivity throws on older macOS versions #3164
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] HandlerChanged is not invoked when delete/dispose a View #3163
  • [Bug] CollectionView Crash on Android using a custom header #3162
  • [Bug] Error loading images on Windows #3160
  • [Bug] Not able to add axml files #3159

Closed

  • Load BlazorWebView HostPage from embedded resource? #3103
  • [Bug] [iOS] Storyboard not being generated, app layout is wrong. #2787
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] "Android Emulator" option does not appear in VS 2022 P6. #3110

PullRequests

Created

  • Set up for unpackaged app projects #3172
  • Clean up Shell Chrome Behaviors #3165
    area/shell 🐢
  • [compatibility] IsTrimmable support, fix linker warnings #3161

Merged

  • Prep Update to WASDK Preview 3 #3153
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add ContainerView to Layout if it's present #3151
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3155
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix iOS splash screens in partial builds #3152
    6.0.101-preview.10

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Use Essentials over the old Device class #2488
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Start to remove old things in Maui #2266
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Try using an internal feed on DevDiv #3128
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141
  • Use the default Button theme #1698
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Add pending Core interfaces comments #3146
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement Invalidate method in GraphicsView #3142
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for common table expressions (aka WITH) by translating LINQ query #26486
  • Visual Studio assumes return value from FirstOrDefaultAsync() cannot be null #26485
  • efcore 6 bundle error #26479
  • Implement interceptors for Cosmos #26478
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Migration from EF Core 3.1 to 5 - Using property Count in IReadOnlyCollection throws NullReferenceException #26433
    7.0.0
  • Filtered Include Does Not Seem to work in Tests #26482
  • Is there an out of the box functionality to traverse a graph of tracked entities? #26461
  • ForeignKey on Entity without primary key #26468
  • Insert record sequentially in DB without identity on PK #26480
  • Revisit model-snapshot for perf #18620
  • Query: Allow InExpression values to store list of expressions rather than just constant expression storing an array #21462
  • HasQueryFilter is ignored by aggregate functions #26327
  • Ensure that EF Core with SQLite is a good experience in Blazor WASM #21101
  • Ef Core - On the Fly? #26416
  • Analyzer: Unnecessary Configuration #11217
  • The specified deps.json [...] does not exist #26477
  • Query: Non-tracking query doesn't throw for null keys #26310
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Identify Contains on IReadOnlySet/IImmutableSet #26487
    auto-merge
  • Identify WITH as generally composable in FromSql #26484
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.Design #26481
  • Query: Avoid pushdown when joining with a subquery which can be lifte… #26476

Merged

  • Query: Convert IReadOnlyCollection.Count to Queryable.Count() #26483
    auto-merge
  • Evolve null-checking approach #26459
  • Query: Remove obsoleted code #26475
    auto-merge
  • Query: Throw exception for null key value in non-tracking #26311

Updated

  • [6.0.1] Register design-time LoggerFactory as Scoped #26460
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • We keep getting this config file added by the insertion pipeline and it fails the build. #12554

Updated

  • Update to 6.0 in our wxl files as that was reverted a while back. #12550
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12544
  • Allow SDK to produce reference assemblies #12549
  • GetRuntimeInformation.targets: determine PortableProductMonikerRid based on OSName and Architecture. #12516
